meaningMnemonic: If a <kanji>mediator</kanji> <kanji>touch</kanji>es people the right way, they will become a <vocabulary>catalyst</vocabulary> for change. This could be good or bad change depending on what they stuck their hands in.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
